# ConfigurationSynchronizerFactory.Instance method

Get the singleton instance

```csharp
public static ConfigurationSynchronizerFactory Instance(string directoryCatalog = "./Pipelines")
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| directoryCatalog | Define where to read all catalog assemblies Optional. Default : ./Pipelines |

the singleton instance
